price: ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߕߏߕߐ߫ ߦߋ߲߬ ߠߋ߬ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߦߟߍ߬ߡߊ߲߬ ߦߙߐ߫ ߢߌߣߌ߲߫ ߠߊ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߓߐ߫ ߦߋ߲߬
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يَبۡغُونَ عَنۡهَا حِوَلٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā lā yabghūna ʿanhā ḥiwalan
